commit.message:
tree.c (get_unwidened): Check TREE_UNSIGNED on the field's type.

        * tree.c (get_unwidened): Check TREE_UNSIGNED on the field's type.
        (get_narrower): Likewise.

From-SVN: r72787

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
 2003-10-21  Jason Merrill  <jason@redhat.com>
 
+	* tree.c (get_unwidened): Check TREE_UNSIGNED on the field's type.
+	(get_narrower): Likewise.
+
 	* stor-layout.c (layout_decl): Do packed field alignment for
 	bit-fields, too.
